channel.title: Waiting 4 Wrath
channel.copyright: 4Wrath. Creative Commons. Just don't be a dick about it ok.
channel.description: Grab a brew and laugh along with Shea and Aaron each week as they review beer, learn new things and BS about politics, current events, and all things religious or otherwise. It's the beer guzzling atheist podcast you didn't know you were waiting for!
channel.itunes:author: Shea & Aaron
channel.itunes:summary: Grab a brew and laugh along with Shea and Aaron each week as they review beer, learn new things and BS about politics, current events, and all things religious or otherwise. It's the beer guzzling atheist podcast you didn't know you were waiting for!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Waiting 4 Wrath

item.title: W4W - Episode 005
item.description:
Show Description

FCC puts Sally Morgan in the slow lane for channeling Hitler's ghost at Pat Robertson's atheist wedding.

Beer Review:

Skull Splitter Orcadian Ale - The Orkney Brewery, Quoyloo
bit.ly/1jvduuR

Ratings: 1,691
Reviews: 917
rAvg: 4.08
pDev: 12.5%

Ingredients:  Unlisted

ABV:  8.50% abv.

Today's Stories:

  • Recap: Fuck the fucking FCC: http://bit.ly/1ojirZq
  • Atheists can't get married: http://bit.ly/1ne9zb8
  • There's no right way to quote Hitler: bit.ly/TSGciT
  • Psychic Sally only communicates with the dead: http://dly.st/1pZqaTs
  • Finally, someone else embarrassed by Pat Robertson: http://bit.ly/1sx9jV2

Faith In Humanity Restored:

91-year-old Harriette Thompson beats up a marathon with cancer: http://bit.ly/1sx9Czl

Next Weeks Beer:

Sixty-One by Dogfish Head - The continually hopped India Pale Ale brewed with Syrah grape must
http://bit.ly/1qVrg1V

Style: American IPA
ABV: 6.50%
Availability: Rotating

Join The Discussion:

We'd love to hear from you! To comment on a show or suggest a brew visit our web, twitter or facebook pages. As always, we'd love to get a good rating on iTunes or Stitcher!

Twitter: @4Wrath
Facebook: facebook.com/waiting4wrath
Web: waiting4wrath.com

iTunes: http://bit.ly/wrathTunes
Stitcher: http://bit.ly/wrathStitch

 Bonus Cat Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G4Sn91t1V4g
item.itunes:subtitle: Marry an Atheist? I'd rather quote Hitler!

item.title: W4W - Episode 004
item.description:
Show Description

Duggar family rescues Theranian youth from Cadbury Jihad with protective moose cum and barbed wire.

Beer Review:

Voodoo Doughnut Pretzel, Raspberry & Chocolate Ale - Rogue Ales
bit.ly/1mYClth

"Homer would love this!"

Ingredients:  Unlisted

ABV: 6.75% abv.

Today's Stories:

  • Doggar family needs help breeding: http://on.today.com/U4x77a
  • Theran hates you: http://nyti.ms/1luOkfF
  • Moose cum and barbed wire keep you safe from gay: http://bit.ly/1ybBgG6
  • The Cadbury Jihad: http://bit.ly/1kZ44wh

Faith In Humanity Restored:

Man finds a baby moose and does the only reasonable thing — he takes it to a donut shop: http://bit.ly/1sk1tSu

Next Weeks Beer:

Skull Splitter by Orkney Brewery
http://bit.ly/1jvduuR

Style: Scotch Ale / Wee Heavy
ABV: 8.5%
Availability: Year-round!

item.title: W4W - Episode 003
item.description:
Show Description

The FCC makes anti-Gay Christian extremists drink sunscreen to play bigot bingo on Mars with King Tut's penis.

Beer Review:

New Planet Belgian Ale - Gluten Free!
http://bit.ly/1k0Jruf

"It's not entirely dissimilar to beer!"

Ingredients:  Sorghum, Brown Rice, Honey, Orange Peel, Cinnamon Powder, Vanilla Extract, Hops & Yeast

Suggested pairings:  Due to the spice, citrus and honey notes, our Belgian pairs beautifully with a range of foods. Try: Mussels, Crab and Calamari (and other light seafood’s), Sharp cheeses – especially a Belgian Blue or Gruyere, Spring green salads topped with Grilled salmon or chicken and a citrus based vinaigrette

Hops: Sterling
ABV: 6.8% abv.
IBU’s: 26
SEASONAL - Spring/Summer

Today's Stories:

  • College Atheists Push Back Against Hateful Christian Preacher in Very Clever Ways: http://bit.ly/1nX3lPa
  • Kentucky Argues Gay Marriage Ban Is Needed To Ensure Existence Of Human Race: http://bit.ly/1pMpiQy
  • FCC approves plan to allow for paid priority on Internet: http://wapo.st/1pftjKT
  • Fight heartburn, drink sunscreen: http://huff.to/1p31NCE
  • King Tutankhamun was mummified with an erect penis to 'quash religious revolution': http://ind.pn/1kI5FWO

Faith In Humanity Restored:

5 Reasons Why You Should Know Future Mars-Walker Alyssa Carson: http://bit.ly/1kGoie3

Next Weeks Beer:

Voodoo Doughnut Pretzel, Raspberry & Chocolate Ale by Rogue Ales
http://bit.ly/1mYClth

Style: American Brown Ale
ABV: 6.75%
Availability: Limited (brewed once)

Join The Discussion:

We'd love to hear from you! To comment on a show or suggest a brew visit our web, twitter or facebook pages. As always, we'd love to get a good rating on iTunes or Stitcher!

Facebook: facebook.com/waiting4wrath

item.title: W4W - Episode 002
item.description:
Gravy Fountain

In today's episode the guys talk about a Christian patriarch speach from Egypt inciting Jews to feed Godzilla unkosher meat in Reykjavik.

Beer of the week:

Belhaven, Scottish Ale, imported from Scotland

News & Stories:

  • Mentioned last time: Fort Collins high school club takes up Pledge of Allegiance in Arabic: http://www.coloradoan.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=2013301280022 
  • Japanese fans thing American Godzilla is too fat: http://www.japantoday.com/category/entertainment/view/japanese-fans-say-new-american-godzilla-is-too-fat - He ate too many McDonalds I guess… ‘Merica!
  • Alabama Chief Justice Says Freedom Of Religion Should Only Apply To Christians: http://politix.topix.com/news/11870-watch-alabama-chief-justice-says-freedom-of-religion-should-only-apply-to-christians
  • Man with worlds largest dick asked by penis museum to make a “donation” upon his death: http://www.eurthisnthat.com/2014/05/02/man-gifted-with-worlds-longest-penis-asked-if-he-will-donate-it-to-penis-museum-no-seriously/#more-32147
  • Egypt uncovers Simpsons conspiracy to destabilize the Arab world: http://www.avclub.com/article/egypt-uncovers-simpsons-conspiracy-destabilize-ara-204387
  • Far rightwing patriarchal movement, led by a guy named Jim Bob, is rocked by sex scandals: http://www.thedailybeast.com/articles/2014/04/16/sex-scandal-rocks-the-duggars-christian-patriarchy-movement.html

 

Faith In Humanity:
Homeless Homes: http://www.sliptalk.com/2014/05/07/homeless-homes/
item.itunes:subtitle: Gravy Fountain

item.title: W4W - Episode 001
item.description:
Hello World!

In this the inaugural episode of Waiting 4 wrath! In W4W - 001 - We're Live! the guys introduce themselves, a beer and a collection of heart warming, melting and burning stories from around the world.

Today's Lesson

If a man's zipper is down, that's his problem. You didn't see anything!

Beer of the Week:

Belhaven, Scottish Ale, imported from Scotland

Show notes

  • 5 things we should know acording to Happy Place: http://happyplace.someecards.com/31080/5-things-you-should-at-least-pretend-to-know-today-may-5-2014
  • Dog gets life in Jail: http://www.azcentral.com/story/news/local/phoenix/2014/03/25/phoenix-mickey-pit-bull-fate/6879191/
  • Bitcoins?? http://www.newser.com/story/186136/every-mit-undergrad-getting-100-in-bitcoin.html
  • Sarah Palin says water boarding is like baptizing terrorists, hillbilly christains agree: http://www.salon.com/2014/04/30/bryan_fischer_sarah_palins_joke_about_waterboarding_people_was_clever_and_funny/
  • Opening town hall mertings with a prayer: http://america.aljazeera.com/articles/2014/5/5/supreme-state-church.html & http://bigstory.ap.org/article/high-court-ruling-favors-prayer-council-meeting
  • Preview of the Satan Statue: http://www.theverge.com/2014/5/3/5678782/satanic-group-reveals-crowdfunded-monument-for-oklahoma-state-capitol

Faith in Humanity Restored

This guy is a good father!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y8mzDvpKzfY

 

Quick Laugh

Thanks for listening!

For more wrath find us on waiting4wrath.com, Facebook.com/waiting4wrath and twitter @4wrath and don't forget to rate your hosts!
item.itunes:subtitle: We're live! Hello World.
